title: AI, Copyright, and Policy Challenges: Presentation at the Copyright Office of Colombia
content: Andr√©s Izquierdo, Counsel at the Program on Information Justice and Intellectual Property (PIJIP) and the Geneva Centre on Knowledge Governance, recently presented at the Copyright Office of Colombia on the evolving relationship between artificial intelligence and copyright law, examining how generative AI is challenging existing legal doctrines and reshaping creative and informational ecosystems. The presentation focused on core issues such as […]
creator: Andres Izquierdo
sourceDescription: - Hosted by the American University Program on Information Justice and Intellectual Property
